scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache && npm run build && npm run export && npm touch out/.nojekyll && git add out/ && git commit -m "Deploy Next.js to gh-pages" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.upload:old: npm run build && npm run export && echo next.erniexx.website >> out/CNAME && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
scripts.upload: npm run build && npm run export && git add . && git commit -m "update" && git subtree push --prefix out origin gh-pages
